mapper.sql: id, code, name, manager, warehouse_level, province_code, city_code, county_code, address, zipcode, fax, tel, mobile, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_warehouse ( id, code, name, manager, warehouse_level, province_code, city_code, county_code, address, zipcode, fax, tel, mobile, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{manager}, #{warehouseLevel}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{countyCode}, #{address}, #{zipcode}, #{fax}, #{tel}, #{mobile}, #{enable}, #{sort}, #{description}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{modifyBy}, 1, 1 )

INSERT INTO tb_warehouse ( id, code, name, manager, warehouse_level, province_code, city_code, county_code, address, zipcode, fax, tel, mobile, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.code}, #{item.name}, #{item.manager}, #{item.warehouseLevel}, #{item.provinceCode}, #{item.cityCode}, #{item.countyCode}, #{item.address}, #{item.zipcode}, #{item.fax}, #{item.tel}, #{item.mobile}, #{item.enable}, #{item.sort}, #{item.description}, now(), #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.modifyBy}, 1, 1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_warehouse t SET
t.code = #{code},
t.name = #{name},
t.manager = #{manager},
t.warehouse_level = #{warehouseLevel},
t.province_code = #{provinceCode},
t.city_code = #{cityCode},
t.county_code = #{countyCode},
t.address = #{address},
t.zipcode = #{zipcode},
t.fax = #{fax},
t.tel = #{tel},
t.mobile = #{mobile},
t.enable = #{enable},
t.sort = #{sort},
t.description = #{description},
t.modify_by = #{modifyBy},
t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_warehouse t SET t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now(), t.row_valid = 0 WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_warehouse t WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_warehouse t WHERE t.id = #{value} AND t.row_valid = 1
SELECT FROM tb_warehouse t WHERE t.row_valid = 1 AND t.code = #{code} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_warehouse t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
